body_html:
@vadimkantorov Your grievance is legit, and I remember mentioning this to Greg a while back.

Basically, we want this: torch.eye(some_shape, **x.options()) (or some similar name; options is what we're calling it in C++). This would be a very useful addition, and should not be hard to code at al.

body:
@vadimkantorov Your grievance is legit, and I remember mentioning this to Greg a while back.

Basically, we want this: `torch.eye(some_shape, **x.options())` (or some similar name; options is what we're calling it in C++). This would be a very useful addition, and should not be hard to code at al.
